GSD.product_version: versions from v4.0 to before v4.19.193
GSD.description:
NFS: Don't corrupt the value of pg_bytes_written in nfs_do_recoalesce()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.193 by commit 40f139a6d50c232c0d1fd1c5e65a845c62db0ede, it was introduced in version v4.0 by commit a7d42ddb3099727f58366fa006f850a219cce6c8. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: NFS: Don't corrupt the value of pg_bytes_written in nfs_do_recoalesce()
